title: Backend policy
description: What the backend sees of a policy after authentication.

trial.description: Whether access is a limited trial (what this means is defined by the API backend) - default false.

response-exclude.description: Array of API backend defined identifiers for data that should be excluded from responses.

statements.description: A set of statements describing access to an API. Where multiple statements refer to the same API, access is granted to the union of datasets described by each statement.

items.description: A statement describing access to certain datasets within a single API.

restrictions.description: A set of restrictions keyed by field. The dataset returned should be limited to the intersection of datasets returned by each individual restriction.

additionalProperties.description: The included values for the restriction field - where multiple values are included results should be returned where the field matches any of the values.

items.description: Value for the field - can be any type (valid types depending on API in question).
